items.name: progressbar-containers
items.title: Container Item
items.description: Simple application which display some ProgressBar components inserted into a Container.

items.name: progressbar-toolbars
items.title: Toolbar Docked
items.description: Simple example application which show some ProgressBar components docked in different Toolbars.

items.name: progressbar-messagebox
items.title: MessageBox
items.description: Simple application which showcase how to use the new Progress MessageBox.

items.name: radial-progressbar-meteo
items.title: Meteo
items.description: Simple application which show how to use the Radial ProgressBar to display meteo forecasts.

items.name: radial-progressbar-audio
items.title: Audio
items.description: Simple example which show how to control an audio file and display its informations changing also the dunut config.

items.name: radial-progressbar-mask
items.title: Masking
items.description: Small example which show how to customize the look of the progressbar using a mask image.

items.name: audio-track-playlist
items.title: Playlist
items.description: Simple music playlist application which show how to use the AudioTrack component.

items.name: editable-list-single-mode
items.title: Single Edit Mode
items.description: Simple application which shows the EditableList single editable mode in action.

items.name: editable-list-multi-mode
items.title: Multi Edit Mode
items.description: Simple application which shows the EditableList multi editable mode in action.

items.name: components
items.title: Custom Dataview Components
items.description: This application shows how is possible to use custom editable components.

items.name: gallery
items.title: Photo Gallery
items.description: Small application which show the brand new Gallery component in action.

items.name: progressbar-form
items.title: ProgressBar
items.description: Simple example application which show some ProgressBar form fields in action.

items.name: orb-layout
items.title: Orb Layout
items.description: Small application which show how to arrange container items around a circle using the Orb layout

items.name: touch-timeout
items.title: Touch Timeout
items.description: Simple application which show the TouchTimeout Plugin in action and how it's possible to binf it to any component.
